recommended_degree: Psikologi, Administrasi BIsnis, Administrasi, Teknik Industri, Manajemen (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
Your role will involve assisting the full spectrum of activities across Organization Development team.

1. Assist the team in maintain latest update of Job Spesification and Job Description
2. Assist the team in conducting Job Analysis and Job Evaluation
3. Assist the team in the preparation of organizational structures in the system
4. Participate in organizational development projects
5. Do administrative activities such as filing documents and other correspondence
